name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Backend Developer with over 10 years of experience in building scalable and high-performance backend systems, specializing in financial platforms and data processing. Proficient in **Java 17**, **Dropwizard**, **Restler**, **MongoDB**, **ClickHouse**, **Redis**, **Apache Kafka**, **Kafka Streams**, **Elasticsearch**, **OpenSearch**, and **Airflow**. Expertise in CI/CD and test-driven development ensures robust and efficient code delivery. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills complement a proven ability to collaborate effectively as a team player. Adept at leveraging cloud infrastructure to create automation tools and enhance operational efficiency, with a successful background contributing to notable projects at organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services in **Java 17** using **Dropwizard** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Developed event-driven solutions with **Apache Kafka** and **Redis** to manage asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests.
Deployed microservices on **Cloud infrastructure** using **CI/CD** practices, ensuring seamless deployment and management of applications across environments.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow with **99%** on-time delivery.
Integrated **Test Driven Development** (TDD) methodologies to enhance code quality and reliability, achieving a **95%** test coverage.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** for secure, scalable authentication systems, improving security compliance by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and effective release strategies, contributing to a **20%** reduction in downtime.

Designed and developed robust backend systems using **Java 17** and **Dropwizard** to enhance system performance and reliability, achieving a **30% increase** in response times for API calls.
Implemented RESTful APIs with **MongoDB** as the database layer, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage, which led to a **25% reduction** in data query times.
Created and managed microservices architecture integrating **Kafka** and **Redis** for real-time data processing and caching, which improved transaction response efficiency by **40%**.
Configured CI/CD pipelines with **Airflow** for automated deployment and testing processes, reducing the deployment cycle by **50%** and increasing team productivity.
Applied test-driven development (TDD) practices to ensure high code quality and optimal performance, resulting in lower defect rates in production.
Utilized **ClickHouse** for analytical processing of large datasets, providing insights that enhanced decision-making and reporting capabilities.
Actively engaged in problem-solving sessions and collaborated with other teams to establish best practices in cloud infrastructure management, utilizing **Azure** services and tools for infrastructure optimization.
Demonstrated strong communication skills to liaise effectively with stakeholders and team members, fostering a collaborative environment for project success.

• Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking leveraging **Java 17**, **Dropwizard**, and **MongoDB** to optimize trading operations.
• Engineered real-time data processing systems utilizing **Apache Kafka**, **Kafka Streams**, and **Redis** to provide instant trading information for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to deliver seamless data through **REST APIs** and enhanced communication channels, ensuring a responsive user experience on the platform.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory standards, including MiFID II and GDPR, while maintaining high internal data security protocols and risk management practices.
• Implemented robust testing frameworks using **Test Driven Development (TDD)** principles with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, resulting in a **40%** reduction in bug rates and improved QA processes.
• Introduced job scheduling and automation solutions with **Airflow** and **Celery**, streamlining backend task execution and enhancing process efficiency by **25%**.
• Optimized data storage and retrieval processes with **ClickHouse** and **Elasticsearch**, achieving a **50%** improvement in query response times and overall performance.
